scripts.servePhoenix:
echo -e "
Ensure to start phoenix server at http://localhost:8000 for development.
 Follow https://github.com/phcode-dev/phoenix#running-phoenix for instructions."
scripts.ci-cloneAndBuildPhoenix: node ./src-build/clonePhoenix.js && cd phoenix && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.ci-release:dev: npm run ci-cloneAndBuildPhoenix && cd phoenix && npm run release:dev && cd .. && npm run ci-createDistReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-dist.conf.json
scripts.ci-release:staging: npm run ci-cloneAndBuildPhoenix && cd phoenix && npm run release:staging && cd .. && npm run ci-createDistReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-dist.conf.json
scripts.ci-release:prod: npm run ci-cloneAndBuildPhoenix && cd phoenix && npm run release:prod && cd .. && npm run ci-createDistReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-dist.conf.json
